formalText: Patient seems a bit anxious about being here which she agreed to but didn't really know why
She is coming in for a follow-up after a time in the hospital. She is not sure how much better she feel but certainly better enough to be out of the hospital. She is
coming to get a call or refer her to "them", but they won't do it until the ECT is done
She says "it's good to be back.
and she is pretty relieved to be feeling a little better.
she personally thinks that everything has been okay.
She feels like she  just doesn't know what to say during our meeting
She describes her mind as just kind of blank
she doesn't seem to have that many kind of much annoying side effects.
She mostly feels kind of sad and a little worried
